stock_category_id = #{stockCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update ams_trade_fee_template set stock_category_id = #{stockCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commission_rate = #{commissionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minimum_commission = #{minimumCommission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_fee_rate = #{transferFeeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minimum_charge_count = #{minimumChargeCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buy_stamp_duty_rate = #{buyStampDutyRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sell_stamp_duty_rate = #{sellStampDutyRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fee_templatete_id = #{feeTemplateteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ams_trade_fee_template_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from ams_trade_fee_template as tb where fee_templatete_id= #{fee_templatete_id}
